title: Gun Gale Clock
summary: A Gun Gale Online themed clock for both your phone and watch.
developerAddress:
1 Vista Montana, Apt 4422
San Jose, CA 95134
description: Gun Gale Clock works on both Android phones and Android Wear watches. Tell time like Shinon in the deadly battle of bullets.For phones, use the widget to place the clock on your home screen.For watches, hold down on your background to switch to Gun Gale Clock.
descriptionHTML:
Gun Gale Clock works on both Android phones and Android Wear watches. Tell time like Shinon in the deadly battle of bullets.

For phones, use the widget to place the clock on your home screen.
For watches, hold down on your background to switch to Gun Gale Clock.
comments: Was great when I had an Android Wear watch, but now that I have a Samsung Gear S2, I wish I had a face like this for it.
